title: Executive removal by impeachment in Nigeria

content.question: Which of the following best describes how the president is removed in Nigeria?

choices.label: The Nigerian president is removed through a vote of no confidence in the parliament.
The Nigerian president is removed through impeachment proceedings in the legislature.
The Nigerian constitution does not allow the president to be impeached or removed from office.
The Nigerian president can only be removed by the judiciary, based on British common law.

content.answer: The Nigerian president is removed through impeachment proceedings in the legislature.
